hero.titleDescription: Handcrafted cookies made with real butter, bold flavors, and a nostalgic touch that makes you fall in love.

vainilla.name: Vanilla Chips
vainilla.description: Classic vanilla cookie filled with Hershey’s chocolate chips, topped with chocolate ganache and a white chocolate pearl.

chocolate.name: Intense Chocolate
chocolate.description: For true chocolate lovers: an elegant cocoa cookie filled with Hershey’s chocolate chips, topped with chocolate ganache and crushed cocoa.

red.name: Red Velvet
red.description: Enjoy a taste of everlasting holidays with this innovative Red Velvet cookie, topped with powdered sugar and cranberries.

marmoleada.name: Marbled
marmoleada.description: The best of both worlds: vanilla and cocoa cookie filled with Hershey’s chocolate chips, topped with chocolate ganache and walnuts.

matcha.name: Matcha
matcha.description: For bold flavor lovers: matcha-based cookie filled with white chocolate and coconut, topped with white chocolate and toasted coconut.

reyes.name: Kings Cake Cookie
reyes.description: A limited-edition cookie that reinvents our classic recipe with a white chocolate coating and traditional fruit paste.

contact.important: Your opinion means a lot to us
contact.title: Cookies for your events
contact.description: We create custom cookie orders for events, corporate gifts, and celebrations. Write to us and let’s make something delicious together.
